name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.4-6fa6546ecc13eb00e3235ade0e9bf5d3b7a41b0b "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
